thread.title: Dollar Slides Lower in Aftermath of Fed Minutes

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Slides Lower in Aftermath of Fed Minutes
text:
The dollar edged lower Thursday, a day after minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s latest meeting showed the central bank plans to stay on a gradual path of rate increases even if inflation meets its target.
The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was recently down 0.2%, to 87.02.
Expectations that...
